original_title: 삶의 자리, 투쟁의 자리 - 영구임대주택 쟁취를 위하여
overview: In 1990, due to the skyrocketing rental price, many tenants suffered and even took their own lives. Showing their memorial service as a starting point, we approach the problems of housing policy and the social structural problems of Korean society.
title: Where we live, where we struggle
